Package hu.bme.mit.brszta

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.brszta.Cell
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyCell, MineCell
public abstract class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
One cell on the Minesweeper board. Either contains a mine, or not. A cell can be revealed or flagged.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    hu.bme.mit.brszta.CellState cellState
    Current state of the cell.
    int displayNumber
    Number displayed after revealing the cell.
    protected java.util.List<Cell> neighbourCells
    A list of the cells adjacent to this cell.

    • Cell

      public Cell()

  • Method Details

    • addNeighbourCell

      public void addNeighbourCell​(Cell neighbourCell)
      Add a neighbour cell to this cell. The cell counts the neighbour mines among its neighbours, and it can reveal them in case of a recursive reveal.
      Parameters:
      neighbourCell - The cell added as a neighbour.

    • reveal

      public abstract int reveal()
      Reveal the cell.
      Returns:
      Value of the cell. See specific overrides.

    • isMine

      public abstract boolean isMine()

    • revealNeighbours

      protected void revealNeighbours()
      Reveal all the neighbour cells. Happens when the cell is revealed and it has no mines among its neighbours, ie. its display value is blank.

    • flag

      public hu.bme.mit.brszta.CellState flag()
      Flag the cell, or remove flag from the cell. Cycles FLAGGED and DEFAULT state.
      Returns:
      The new state of the cell.
